verses.verse: To the chief <S%H5329>Musician<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H4192>Muth-labben,<s%> A <S%H4210>Psalm<s%> of <S%H1732>David.<s%> I will <S%H3034>praise<s%> thee, O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> with my <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H3820>heart;<s%> I will show <S%H5608>forth<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> thy marvelous <S%H6381>works.<s%>
I will be <S%H8055>glad<s%> and <S%H5970>rejoice<s%> in thee: I will sing <S%H2167>praise<s%> to thy <S%H8034>name,<s%> O thou most <S%H5945>High.<s%>
When mine <S%H341>enemies<s%> are <S%H7725>turned<s%> <S%H268>back,<s%> they shall <S%H3782>fall<s%> and <S%H6>perish<s%> at thy <S%H4480>presence.<s%> <S%H6440><s%>
For <S%H3588><s%> thou hast <S%H6213>maintained<s%> my <S%H4941>right<s%> and my <S%H1779>cause;<s%> thou <S%H3427>satest<s%> in the <S%H3678>throne<s%> <S%H8199>judging<s%> <S%H6664>right.<s%>

Thou hast <S%H1605>rebuked<s%> the <S%H1471>heathen,<s%> thou hast <S%H6>destroyed<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked,<s%> thou hast put <S%H4229>out<s%> their <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H5769>forever<s%> and <S%H5703>ever.<s%>

O thou <S%H341>enemy,<s%> <S%H2723>destructions<s%> are come to a perpetual <S%H8552>end:<s%> <S%H5331><s%> and thou hast <S%H5428>destroyed<s%> <S%H5892>cities;<s%> their <S%H2143>memorial<s%> is <S%H6>perished<s%> with <S%H1992>them.<s%>
But the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H3427>endure<s%> <S%H5769>forever:<s%> he hath <S%H3559>prepared<s%> his <S%H3678>throne<s%> for <S%H4941>judgment.<s%>
And <S%H1931>he<s%> shall <S%H8199>judge<s%> the <S%H8398>world<s%> in <S%H6664>righteousness,<s%> he shall minister <S%H1777>judgment<s%> to the <S%H3816>people<s%> in <S%H4339>uprightness.<s%>
The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> also will <S%H1961>be<s%> a <S%H4869>refuge<s%> for the <S%H1790>oppressed,<s%> a <S%H4869>refuge<s%> in <S%H6256>times<s%> of <S%H6869>trouble.<s%>

And they that <S%H3045>know<s%> thy <S%H8034>name<s%> will put their <S%H982>trust<s%> in thee: <S%H3588>for<s%> thou, <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> hast <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> them that <S%H1875>seek<s%> thee.
Sing <S%H2167>praises<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> which <S%H3427>dwelleth<s%> in <S%H6726>Zion:<s%> <S%H5046>declare<s%> among the <S%H5971>people<s%> his <S%H5949>doings.<s%>

When <S%H3588><s%> he maketh <S%H1875>inquisition<s%> for <S%H1818>blood,<s%> he <S%H2142>remembereth<s%> them: he <S%H7911>forgetteth<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> the <S%H6818>cry<s%> of the <S%H6035>humble.<s%>

Have <S%H2603>mercy<s%> upon me, O <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H7200>consider<s%> my <S%H6040>trouble<s%> which I suffer of them that <S%H4480>hate<s%> <S%H8130><s%> me, thou that liftest me <S%H7311>up<s%> from the <S%H4480>gates<s%> <S%H8179><s%> of death: <S%H4194><s%>

That <S%H4616><s%> I may show <S%H5608>forth<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> thy <S%H8416>praise<s%> in the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion:<s%> I will <S%H1523>rejoice<s%> in thy <S%H3444>salvation.<s%>

The <S%H1471>heathen<s%> are sunk <S%H2883>down<s%> in the <S%H7845>pit<s%> that they <S%H6213>made:<s%> in the <S%H7568>net<s%> <S%H2098>which<s%> they <S%H2934>hid<s%> is their own <S%H7272>foot<s%> <S%H3920>taken.<s%>

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is <S%H3045>known<s%> by the <S%H4941>judgment<s%> which he <S%H6213>executeth:<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> is <S%H3369>snared<s%> in the <S%H6467>work<s%> of his own <S%H3709>hands.<s%> <S%H1902>Higgaion.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
The <S%H7563>wicked<s%> shall be <S%H7725>turned<s%> into <S%H7585>hell,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> that <S%H7913>forget<s%> <S%H430>God.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> the <S%H34>needy<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5331>always<s%> be <S%H7911>forgotten:<s%> the <S%H8615>expectation<s%> of the <S%H6041>poor<s%> shall not <S%H6>perish<s%> <S%H5703>forever.<s%>
Arise, <S%H6965><s%> O <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> let <S%H408>not<s%> <S%H582>man<s%> <S%H5810>prevail:<s%> let the <S%H1471>heathen<s%> be <S%H8199>judged<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> thy <S%H6440>sight.<s%>
Put <S%H7896><s%> them in <S%H4172>fear,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> that the <S%H1471>nations<s%> may <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H1992>themselves<s%> to be but <S%H582>men.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
